mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_veri (email, code, is_verified, requested_at, expires_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{code}, FALSE, NOW(), #{expiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE code = #{code}, is_verified = FALSE, requested_at = NOW(), expires_at = #{expiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT email, code, is_verified AS isVerified, expires_at AS expiresAt FROM email_veri WHERE email = #{email}
